title: Expert Course on Developing Blended Online Learning Materials in Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and understanding of fundamental science concepts
context.additional_context: Provides a blended learning environment for in-service professionals to participate without time/space constraints. Continuous feedback and improvement through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners will apply 3+ effective instructional strategies when designing online science education materials
Learners will create interactive learning modules using simulation/VR technologies
Learners will develop science content utilizing Open Educational Resources (OER) while complying with copyright guidelines
Learners will enhance the quality of developed educational materials through peer review systems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
